data.title: Solar Turbines: Life
data.meta_description: Solar Turbines | 221,999 followers on LinkedIn. Innovative, Sustainable Energy Solutions. | Headquartered in San Diego, California, USA, Solar Turbines Incorporated, a subsidiary of Caterpillar Inc., is one of the world’s leading manufacturers of industrial gas turbines, with more than 16,000 units and over 3 billion operating hours in over 100 countries. Products from Solar Turbines play an important role in the development of oil, natural gas and power generation projects around the world. Solar Turbines’ products include gas turbine engines (rated from 1,590 to 52,500 horsepower), gas compressors, and gas turbine-powered compressor sets, mechanical-drive packages and generator sets (ranging from 1 to 39 megawatts).
data.text:
“I fell in love with San Diego the day I drove in to start my internship at Solar in 2011. I told myself the company would have to be a terrible fit for me to not want to move out West permanently. Luckily for me Solar was a tremendous fit. From the first day, Solar has been a place where people will drop everything to help someone out. That fosters an environment where everyone can learn and grow at a fast pace. The other thing I like about Solar are the vast opportunities to try different roles and jobs both domestically and internationally. Working for a company that supports every corner of the globe is challenging and exciting. I look forward to being here for many years to come.”

“As I approach my 8th year at Solar Turbines, I can't imagine having as many career experiences as I've had anywhere else. Solar has given me the ability to grow my engineering aptitude and leadership skills. With many opportunities to move around the company, I feel confident that I’ll always look forward to learning through new experiences. However, my favorite part about working her is Solar’s culture and focus on people.”
